subject: Re: [LH] Conclusion
body:
On 5/14/07, Albert Lust  wrote:
>
>
>
> As I promised you before I would give you my verdict
> after enough time would have expired to let it all sink
> in properly. I think 18 months is about right - so :
>
> Aerial IS her best album.
>
> For your information : it contains 5 great songs,
> 5 good songs, 3 reasonable songs and no bad songs.
>
> (no, Aerial Tal is not a song - but quite enjoyable anyway).

you've got to be effing kidding me!  Aerial's drivel, that's what it is.

her best album is HOL, by far.
